html:
1.12.24  8:05 pm   have you ever experimented around with a 24 keys-per-octave keyboard? basically one with quarter tones between all the regular notes

     i've tried it on my own keyboard but it's not useful to me

1.12.24  7:29 pm   do you like to dream? (i mean it literally),

     sometimes

     if yes, do you dream songs?

     sometimes

     if so, can you remember and write them after you wake up?

     sometimes

     I dream song sometimes but i forget them in the morning real fast

     they slip fast. if you practice you can maximize your catch rate

1.12.24  6:33 pm   What isn't the time right now

      1:71

1.12.24  5:44 pm   how to make a zillion dollars

      buy something for 99 zillion dollars and then improve it slightly, and then sell it for 100 zillion

1.12.24  5:39 pm   what is your favorite number,??? 

      1 or 2

1.12.24  5:13 pm   has anyone inspired you?

     yes

     if so, who?

     everyone. it occurs to me that that is possibly not what you wanted to hear

1.12.24  3:07 pm   ive asked you a few inane questions and i forget what i asked so i have to scroll down to find a question i dont even remember asking. is it worth it. i value your response because youre cool but now im getting exstitential about this. hi btw

      hi

1.12.24  1:28 pm   what did you do after you make an incredibly long video

      in one case i edited and released 6 years of audio/video journal content, and created a new section on my website to house those clips. and in another case, i produced and released a short series of songs (audio only)

1.12.24  12:50 pm   have you gone through a metamorphosis?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.12.24  12:35 pm   Have you ever solved a rubik's cube

      no

1.12.24  11:48 am   do you like furniture

      yes

1.12.24  11:00 am   if someone asked you to play any song you've written which one would you play?

      i would have to request additial criteria in order to make a meaningful selection

1.12.24  10:43 am   what should your community/fanbase be called?

      each person should retain their individual identity, and name. hopefully

1.12.24  7:36 am   I think i made a typo

      i'm impressed

1.12.24  5:58 am   Do you feel any sort of obligation to answer questions on this page, or is it more of a hobby? 

      it's a challenge

1.12.24  3:23 am   How to be cool

      anyway

1.12.24  1:09 am   is it possible for you to have an interview with someone who gets and really likes your work?? I would love to hear that interview so badly

      i think it's possible

1.12.24  12:58 am   can i interview u but it's not like we record or broadcast it or anything instead it's just us having a conversation about stuff for an hour or so

      sure

1.11.24  11:33 pm   im going to the store do you want anything

      yes but that has nothing to do with going to the store

1.11.24  11:01 pm   if you could add a letter to the alphabet what sound(s) would it make

      'sh', for example

1.11.24  10:46 pm   Are you from venus

      probably not

1.11.24  9:51 pm   what is your favorite movie or tv show?

      never found one

1.11.24  8:36 pm   is the meaning of life 42 or is it just a number?

      neither. the meaning of life is not just a number, nor 42 (a number). actually, this entire subject matter is a quote from a popular book, but the quote actually became even more popular than the book which might not even be known anymore by people who bring this up

1.11.24  7:22 pm   Do you recommend blackout curtains?

      i don't have any curtain recommendations. i feel that would be an overstep of boundaries, in this case

1.11.24  5:55 pm   why does it feel like the world is going to end 

      because it's getting ready to start

1.11.24  5:08 pm   where am i

      earth, i think

1.11.24  4:29 pm   i think i'm gonna take a break to get worse, just for a little bit. then i'll come back and catch up on all the things i was supposed to be doing while i was getting worse instead. i've just been wanting to get worse for so long i can't put it off much longer

      i understand

1.11.24  3:51 pm   why are your videos in 25fps?

      i must have been in a european mindset between 2011 and 2019

1.11.24  2:38 pm   Do you have any tips for not getting stuck in the weeds while mixing/editing music? 

      do it live

1.11.24  2:19 pm   I've been working on music for a while and I'm pretty close to finished and I find myself slowing down and drawing out the process. What's that about?

      maybe you are scared of finishing it because then you will find out whether you like it

1.11.24  2:18 pm   Bill I just had a very vivid daydream (I was in class) where I sent you the question "what colour did you change the grass to" and you answered "6". Do you know what this means?

      yes. it means on some level you have a very incorrect intuition about how i would deal with that question. this is not a bad thing

1.11.24  1:46 pm   are shrimps bugs

      i'm not sure

1.11.24  1:03 pm   i mean, what are the odds?

      50%

1.11.24  12:29 pm   how special are you feeling today?

      all the way

1.11.24  12:23 pm   favorite time zone to eat breakfast in?

      UTC+05:45

1.11.24  12:07 pm   how do i make sense

      you can get some pre-made sense. just kidding, that will never work

1.11.24  11:41 am   do you wish kronk from the emperor's new groove were a real person

      no, but if i had ever seen/heard the story i might feel differently

1.11.24  11:36 am   How did you choose the various colors for the links to different pages

      art

1.11.24  11:19 am   Why is it spelled gratefull??? Why the shit isn't it spelled greatfull???????

      this is probably not what you want to hear right now, but there is only one L

1.11.24  11:05 am   how do i control my emotions? my family doesnt like the fact that im easy to get angry by someone or something dumb

      in that case you might have to surround yourself with smart things

1.11.24  11:00 am   what should my science experiment be about?

      which way is up

1.11.24  10:35 am   do you use shampoo or not?

      yes, but not for political reasons

1.11.24  9:59 am   since orange is a combination of red and yellow, why don't we call it redlow?

      because that would be a terrible name, also there was already a popular fruit called orange

1.11.24  9:53 am   today my teacher played at the corner store in music class

      i want to believe you

1.11.24  9:43 am   if you wrote a song, what would it be about?

      i'd have to analyze it after, to figure that out really

1.11.24  8:27 am   why did the chicken cross the road?

      it was looking for zebras. there was a zebra crossing there

1.11.24  7:42 am   What's the funniest crime?

      justice

1.11.24  4:29 am   the power's out and i'm bored, what do i do

      see how large a gap you can find between prime numbers. in other words, see how long a string of consecutive unprime integers you can find

1.11.24  4:02 am   do you consider topology

      occasionally

1.11.24  1:44 am   how do i stop being scared all the time? it's becoming a bit of a problem

      this may be kind of an oblique strategy, but have you tried being scared of 2 things at once
